TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapHttpClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: 指定当使用 SOAP 时客户端代理从其中派生的类。

span.span: Specifies the class client that proxies derive from when using SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要生成 XML Web service 客户端, 则必须为 XML Web service 创建间接或直接从其派生的代理类。If you are building an XML Web service client, then a proxy class that derives indirectly or directly from must be created for the XML Web service. 当 XML Web service 客户端使用 SOAP 调用时, 代理类必须从 派生自的派生。When the XML Web service client calls using SOAP, the proxy class must derive from , which derives from . 反过来, 派生自。, in turn, derives from . 若要与 XML Web service 通信, 请创建间接或直接从中为要调用的 XML Web service 派生的代理类。To communicate with an XML Web service, create a proxy class that derives indirectly or directly from for the XML Web service you want to call. 请使用 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 为给定 XML Web service 的服务说明创建代理类, 而不是手动创建代理类。Instead of creating the proxy class manually, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description. 为 SOAP 协议生成代理类时, 通过方法对 XML Web service 方法进行同步调用, 而使用方法和方法进行异步调用。When a proxy class is generated for the SOAP protocol, synchronous calls to XML Web service methods are made via the method, whereas asynchronous calls are made using the method and the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是由 wsdl.exe 为`Math` XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service. 代理类派生自抽象类, 后者派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`从其生成上一个代理类的 XML Web service。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was generated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

para.span: 重写此类时, 可以在派生类中引入特定于特定类型的 XML Web service 的方法。

span.span: When you override this class, you can introduce methods in the derived class which are specific to a particular type of XML Web service.

para.span: 方法捕获参数, 并调用基类来完成与 XML Web service 通信的工作。

span.span: The methods capture the parameters and call the base class to do the work of communicating with the XML Web service.

para.span: 如果引入的方法是异步的, 则调用方法和方法。

span.span: If the introduced methods are asynchronous, call the method and the method.

para.span: 如果引入的方法是同步的, 请调用方法。

span.span: If the introduced methods are synchronous, call the method.

para.span: 重写的构造函数通常将属性设置为 XML Web service 方法的 URL。

span.span: The overridden constructor typically sets the property to the URL of the XML Web service method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

param.name: methodName
param.span: 正调用 方法的派生类中的 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The name of the XML Web service method in the derived class that is invoking the method.

param.span: 对象的数组，包含要传递给 XML Web services 的参数。

span.span: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the XML Web service.

span.span: The order of the values in the array correspond to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

param.name: callback
param.span: 异步调用完成时要调用的委托。

span.span: The delegate to call when the asynchronous invoke is complete.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则不调用委托。

span.span: If is , the delegate is not called.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: 调用方提供的额外信息。

span.span: Extra information supplied by the caller.

summary.span: 开始使用 SOAP 异步调用 XML Web services 方法。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method using SOAP.

returns.span: ，传递给 方法以从远程方法调用中获取返回值。

span.span: An that is passed to the method to obtain the return values from the remote method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 您不会直接调用方法, 除非您为 XML Web service 生成自己的代理类。Typically, you would not call the method directly, unless you were building your own proxy class for an XML Web service. 由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 从服务说明生成的代理类将 XML Web service 方法公开为从代理类派生的名称, 以同步调用 XML Web service 方法。A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) from a Service Description exposes the XML Web service methods as names derived from the proxy class to call the XML Web service methods synchronously. 若要异步调用 XML Web service 方法, 需要向每个 XML Web service 方法的代理类中添加另外两个方法, 其中`Begin`一个前缀添加到了 XML Web service 方法的名称, 另一个`End`添加了前缀。To call the XML Web service methods asynchronously, two additional methods are added to the proxy class for each XML Web service method, one with the `Begin` prefix added to the name of the XML Web service method and one with the `End` prefix added. 代理类调用方法来启动对 XML Web service 方法的异步调用调用。The proxy class calls the method to start an asynchronous invocation call to the XML Web service method. 例如, 如果 XML Web service 公开名为`Add`的 XML Web service 方法, 则代理类包含名`BeginAdd`为的方法, 用于启动对 XML Web service 方法的调用。For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class contains a method named `BeginAdd`, for starting an invocation to the XML Web service method. 在的`BeginAdd`代码中, 对方法进行调用, 并将结果放入`Add`的预期返回类型中。Within the code for the `BeginAdd`, a call is made to the method and the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`. 用于查找可能已添加到方法中的自定义特性, 例如。 `methodName`The `methodName` is used to find the custom attributes which may have been added to the method, such as . 提供有关 SOAP 协议所需的派生方法的其他信息。 provides additional information about the derived method that is required for the SOAP protocol. `asyncState`传入`callback` , 并且包含在从方法返回的中。`asyncState` is passed into `callback` and is included in the that is returned from the method. 参数可用于将与`callback`参数中指定的异步调用上下文有关的信息传递给处理结果的委托。 `asyncState`The `asyncState` parameter can be used to pass information about the context of the asynchronous call, specified in the `callback` parameter, to the delegate that handles the result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (wsdl.exe) 为`Math` XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service. 在 proxy 类的 `Add`方法中, 方法将启动对 XML Web service 方法的异步调用。 `BeginAdd`Within the `BeginAdd` method of the proxy class, the method is starting an asynchronous invocation to the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`从其创建前面的代理类的 XML Web service。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

exception.span: 请求到达了服务器计算机，但未被成功处理。

span.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

exception.span: 请求对对象的当前状态无效。

span.span: The request was not valid for the object's current state.
An error occurred while accessing the network.

Public Sub Discover ()
public: void Discover();

summary.span: 动态绑定到 处的发现文档中描述的 XML Web services。

span.span: Dynamically binds to an XML Web service described in the discovery document at .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web service 客户端可以动态绑定到 XML Web service, 而不是使用方法在代理类中引用的另一个。An XML Web service client can dynamically bind to an XML Web service other than the one referenced in the proxy class using the method. 通常, 属性指的是 XML Web service 的基址。Typically, the property refers to the base address of the XML Web service. 但是, 在调用方法之前, 将属性设置为发现文档的 URL。However, before invoking the method, set the property to a URL of a discovery document. 方法尝试在发现文档中找到与代理类中定义的绑定匹配的匹配项, 然后动态绑定到该绑定。The method attempts to find a match in the discovery document to the binding defined in the proxy class and then dynamically bind to it. 如果成功, 则后续方法调用会定向到发现文档中所述的 XML Web service。If successful, subsequent method calls are directed to the XML Web service described in the discovery document. 如果代理类是使用 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的, 则代理类将定义它使用调用的 XML Web service 方法实现的绑定。If the proxy class is built using the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe), the proxy class defines the binding implemented by the XML Web service methods it invokes using the . 当 XML Web service 实现多个绑定时, Wsdl.exe 将为每个绑定创建一个代理类。When an XML Web service implements multiple bindings, Wsdl.exe creates a proxy class for each binding. 应用于每个代理类是一个, 它定义绑定的名称及其命名空间。Applied to each proxy class is a that defines the name of the binding and its namespace. 将属性设置为的发现文档必须包含对实现相同绑定名称和命名空间的 XML Web service 的引用, 否则会引发异常。The discovery document you set the property to must contain a reference to an XML Web service that implements the same binding name and namespace, or an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个代理类, 它使用`Math` XML Web service 的 wsdl.exe 实用工具生成。The following code example is a proxy class generated using the Wsdl.exe utility for the `Math` XML Web service. 应用于代理类, `Math`该代理类将绑定名称设置`MathSoap`为, 并将其命名空间设置为`http://tempuri.org/`。 A is applied to the `Math` proxy class setting the binding name to `MathSoap` and its namespace to `http://tempuri.org/`. [!code-cpp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是使用上述代理类的 Web 服务客户端。The following code example is a Web Service client using the preceding proxy class. 在 Web 窗体的 事件中,XMLWebservice客户端调用尝试动态绑定到用户提供的URL的方法。`EnterBtn_Click`Within the `EnterBtn_Click` event of the Web Form, the XML Web service client calls the method attempting to dynamically bind to the URL supplied by the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#2)]

exception.span: 未能在 处的发现文档中找到代理类中定义的绑定。

span.span: The binding defined in the proxy class could not be found in the discovery document at .
-or-
The proxy class does not have a binding defined.
XML Web Service Discovery

summary.span: 结束使用 SOAP 异步调用 XML Web services 方法。

span.span: Ends an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method using SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 您不会直接调用方法, 除非您为 XML Web service 生成自己的代理类。Typically, you would not call the method directly, unless you were building your own proxy class for an XML Web service. 由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 为 XML Web service 生成的代理类将 XML Web service 方法公开为代理类的名称, 以便同步调用 XML Web service 方法。A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for an XML Web service exposes the XML Web service methods as names off of the proxy class for calling the XML Web service methods synchronously. 若要异步调用 XML Web service 方法, 需要为每个 XML Web service 方法将两个附加方法添加到代理类, 其中`Begin`一个前缀添加到了 XML Web service 方法的名称, 另一个`End`添加了前缀。For calling the XML Web service methods asynchronously, two additional methods are added to the proxy class for each XML Web service method, one with the `Begin` prefix added to the name of the XML Web service method and one with the `End` prefix added. 代理类调用方法来完成对 XML Web service 方法的异步调用调用。The proxy class calls the method to complete an asynchronous invocation call to the XML Web service method. 例如, 如果 XML Web service 公开名为`Add`的 XML Web service 方法, 则代理类包含一个名`EndAdd`为的方法, 用于完成对 XML Web service 方法的异步调用。For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class contains a method named `EndAdd`, for completing an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method. 在调用的代码`EndAdd`中, 对方法进行调用, 然后将结果放入`Add`的预期返回类型中。Within the code for the `EndAdd` a call is made to the method and then the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是由 wsdl.exe 为`Math` XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service. 在 proxy 类的 `Add`方法中, 方法完成对 XML Web service 方法的异步调用。 `EndAdd`Within the `EndAdd` method of the proxy class, the method completes the asynchronous invocation to the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`从其创建前面的代理类的 XML Web service。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 你不会直接调用方法, 除非你要为 XML Web service 生成自己的代理类。Typically, you do not call the method directly, unless you are building your own proxy class for an XML Web service. 由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 为 XML Web service 生成的代理类将 XML Web service 方法公开为代理类的名称。A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for an XML Web service exposes the XML Web service methods as names off of the proxy class. 代理类调用方法来调用 XML Web service 方法调用。The proxy class calls the method to invoke an XML Web service method call. 例如, 如果 XML Web service 公开名为`Add`的 XML Web service 方法, 则代理类还包含一个名为`Add`的方法。For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class also contains a method named `Add`. 在代理类中`Add`方法的代码中, 通过方法对 XML Web service 方法进行同步调用, 然后将结果放入`Add`的预期返回类型中。Within the code for the `Add` method in the proxy class, a synchronous call is made to the XML Web service method through the method and then the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`. 参数用于查找可能已添加到方法 ( 如) 的自定义属性。 `methodName`The `methodName` parameter is used to find the custom attributes that may have been added to the method, such as . 提供有关 SOAP 协议所需的派生方法的其他信息。 provides additional information on the derived method which is required for the SOAP protocol. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是由 wsdl.exe 为`Math` XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service. 在 proxy 类的 `Add`方法中, 方法调用 XML Web service 方法。 `Add`Within the `Add` method of the proxy class, the method is calling the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`从其创建前面的代理类的 XML Web service。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

exception.span: 请求到达了服务器计算机，但未被成功处理。

span.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

exception.span: 请求对对象的当前状态无效。

span.span: The request was not valid for the object's current state.
An error occurred while accessing the network.
Invokes the specified method asynchronously.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion SoapVersion { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion SoapVersion
Public Property SoapVersion As SoapProtocolVersion

public: property System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapProtocolVersion SoapVersion { System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapProtocolVersion get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapProtocolVersion value); };
member this.SoapVersion : System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于对 XML Web services 修改的 SOAP 请求的 SOAP 协议版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the version of the SOAP protocol used to make the SOAP request to the XML Web service.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 在由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类中将 属性设置为支持SOAP版本1.1的XMLWebservice的Wsdl文档。The property is set in the proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) to by default when a WSDL document for an XML Web service supports SOAP version 1.1. 但是, 当 XML Web service 仅支持 SOAP 1.2 时, wsdl.exe 将属性设置为。 However, when an XML Web service only supports SOAP 1.2, Wsdl.exe sets the property to . 若要在使用 wsdl.exe 生成代理类时选择 SOAP 协议的版本, `/protocol`请使用`SOAP`带有或`SOAP12`设置的开关将属性分别设置为和。To choose the version of the SOAP protocol when generating the proxy class with Wsdl.exe, use the `/protocol` switch with the `SOAP` or `SOAP12` settings to set the property to and , respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将用于与 XML Web service 通信的协议版本设置为 SOAP 1.2。The following code example sets the version of the protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service to SOAP 1.2. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion/CS/serverusageclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion/VB/serverusageclientvb.aspx#1)]
